header.description:
This add-on allows you to integrate Topic Preview with the Board3 Portal.
These instructions are for use with Board3 Portal v2.0.X
You must already have installed: Topic Preview 1.1.0 http://www.phpbb.com/customise/db/mod/topic_preview/ Board3 Portal 2.0.X http://board3.de/
